docs.snippet: From the White House landing to our present encampment, a distance of 15 miles, and within ten miles of Richmond, we found few farm-houses that could be either called comfortable inside or beautiful without.

byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Times.News from the Twenty-second Regiment, in their initial campaign, cannot fail to interest many of your readers, Husbands, fathers, brothers, sons, and lovers, we left our homes at the call of our country :

headline.main: THE MILITIA AT THE WAR.; THE TWENTY-SECOND REGIMENT. IN CAMP AT BALTIMORE FEMALE RABEL SYMPATHIZERS CAMP LIFE.

docs.snippet: I have just returned from Martinsburgh, where the First Brigade is rapidly concentrating, with a view to a still further advance. All is quiet there  not a rebel to be seen.

headline.main: GEN. BANKS' DEPARTMENT.; THE ADVANCE FROM WILLIAMSPORT. The First Brigade at Martinsburgh Prepar- ations for a March on Winchester Gen. Shields' Fight at Front Royal &c., &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: I have just returned from Martinsburgh, where the First Brigade is rapidly concentrating, with a view to a still further advance. All is quiet there not a rebel to be seen.
